segments.text: What a delightful sight, kids sneaking cookies in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretching up on that stool, full of excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar, pulling out treasures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, ready to catch her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Mom's busy with the dishes, giving them the perfect cover.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing adds a fun, splashy element.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate with such care, oblivious and sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes everything glow nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks inviting, like a reward after snacks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how they're cooperating in their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That cookie jar is overflowing with goodies, just like the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is pure childhood joy in action.
segments.speaker: PAR
